Code: EXEC SQL SELECT H.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, H.OCORHIST, H.DTMOVTO, H.VAL_OPERACAO, H.LIMCRR, H.TIPFAV, H.CODPSVI, H.NUMOPG, H.SITUACAO FROM seguros.v0histsini H, outra_tabela O WHERE H.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND H.NUMOPG = :NUMOPG AND O.COD_OPERACAO = H.OPERACAO AND O.FUNCAO_OPERACAO IN ('DPAG','HPAG') AND O.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' END SQL
